Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Omurungo kwabu ewa Nyasaye wabu Omulesi ni emikunda chilaliwa, chiburangamwo emialo hakari wachio. Ako nikhu ulia oritsanga Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi
Ne olwa liloba liliyinia emisiko chialio
Inyanga	eyo	Abandu	balirula mukhukabukhana bechesibwe ebikhole biabu
Kho ulia ukhola amalayi shinga obusiro bwoluloolo yakhakalole
Ne ulia ukhola amabii shinga obusiro bwoluloolo. yakhakalole
Nitsirusia tsinzesele tsiomulilo khukhupa ebilekeyi biatsio hasi
Toto Omundu ni Omukhayi muno wetsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi
Ne toto ye mwene ni omuloli khu ako
Ne toto ye alineshinani shiokhuyanza omwandu
Kho koo akorerwe olwa abali mubilindwa balilamusibwa mubafuu
